issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

epic.name: Android: Rebuild all native modules with gradle
epic.summary: Android: Rebuild all native modules with gradle

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Module needs to be rebuilt for Titanium 9.0.0 to support the following:
* Built as an Android "AAR" library.
* Provide a "POM" file defining its dependencies. (Resolves library version conflicts.)
* Support AndroidX libraries.
* Add x86_64 architecture support.

Repository:
https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.paypal

comments.body:
It looks like PayPal has deprecated the MPL library we're using. They're recommend mobile developers to switch to "Braintree Direct" to handle mobile payments.
https://github.com/paypal/PayPal-Android-SDK

We may need to deprecate/archive our "ti.paypal" module because of this.
